project.objective:
The overall IB-Inno objective will be the establishment of feasibility and efficacy of an enhancing the innovation management capacity of SMEs service in the Balearic Islands region, that leads to a smart growth in the European Union by increasing the efficiency and effectiveness of investments in research, development and innovation and by contributing to a better and more efficient connection of stakeholders in the innovation fabric.
In order to realize this goal, the core objectives are broken down as follows: • Improve the international commercial potential of SMEs • Help SMEs to sustainable high growth through innovation • Achieve tangible managerial transformation
IB-Inno will act as access point to the innovation and internationalization system in the Balearic Islands region, covered by IB-Services Enterprise Europe Network consortium.
project.title: Illes Balears INNOvation Management Services
